śrīḥ
atha dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya pratyūcurmunayastathā | śrotumicchāma bhagavanyajanaṃ nāṭyamaṇḍape || इत्यधिंकं दृश्यतेbharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā prābruvanpratyūcuḥpapracchurmunayastataḥstadā |
bhagavan śrotumicchāmo yajanaṃ nāṭyamaṇḍaperaṅgasaṃśrayam || 1 ||
atha vā yāḥyā kriyā kriyāstatra lakṣaṇaṃ yacca pūjanam |
bhaviṣyadbhiḥ kathaṃ kāryaṃ puruṣairnāṭyayoktṛkṣiḥbhaviṣyadbhirnaraiḥ kāryaṃ kathaṃ vaitannāṭyaveśmani || 2 ||
﻿
ihādauihādirnāṭyayogasyanāṭyavedasya nāṭyamaṇḍapama eva hikīrtito nāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ |
tasmāttasyaiva tāvattvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vaktumarhasi || 3 ||
teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato 'bravīt |
lakṣaṇaṃ pūjanaṃ caiva śrūyatāṃ nāṭyaveśmanaḥveśmani || 4 ||
devānāmdivyānāṃ mānasī sṛṣṭirgṛheṣūpavaneṣu ca |
(पुस्तके इदमधिकं दृश्यतेyatra bhāvā viniṣpannāḥyathābhāvābhinirvartyāḥ sarve bhāvāstu mānuṣāḥ) |
martyānāṃ yatnaniṣpādyānarāṇāṃ yatnata: kāryā lakṣaṇābhihitā kriyā || 5 ||
śrūyatāṃ tadyathā tatrayatra kartavyo nāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ |
tasya daivatapūjā ca vāstu ca pūjā ca yathā yojyā ca vāstuṣuyathā yojyā prayatnataḥ || 6 ||
﻿
iha prekṣāgṛhāṇāṃ tuprekṣāgṛhaṃ dṛṣṭamprekṣāgṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrīmatādhīmatā viśvakarmaṇā |
trividhaḥ sanniveśaśca śāstataḥ parikīrtitaḥparikalpitaḥ || 7 ||
vikṛṣṭaścaturaśraśca tryaśraścaiva tu maṇḍapaḥ |
teṣāṃ trīṇi pramāṇāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ tathā parammadhyamathāparammadhyamathādhamammadhyaṃ tathā 'varam || 8 ||
pramāṇameṣāṃ vijñeyamnirdiṣṭaṃ hastadaṇḍasamāśrayam |
śataṃ sāṣṭamśataṃ cāṣṭau catuḥṣaṣṭirhastā dvātriṃśadeva cadvātriṃśacceti niścayāt |(निश्चितः)dvātriṃśaditi niścayaḥ || 9 ||
﻿
aṣṭādhikaṃ śataṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭistu madhyamam |
kanīyaścakanīyastu tathā veśma dvātriṃśatkaramiṣyatehastā dvātriśaṃdiṣyate || 10 ||
devatānāṃ bhavedevānāṃ bhavanamdevānāṃ tu bhavejjyeṣṭhaṃ nṛpānāṃ madhyamaṃ bhavet |
śeṣāṇāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ tu kanīyaḥ saṃvidhīyate || 11 ||
(एतच्चिह्नाङ्कितो भागः अ त ब पुस्तकेषु दृष्यते । व्याख्या नास्तिprekṣāgṛhāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ praśastaṃ madhyamaṃ smṛtam |
tatra pāṭhyaṃ ca geyaṃ ca sukhaśrāvyataraṃ bhavet ||
prekṣāgṛhāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ triprakāro vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
vikṛṣṭaścaturasraśca tryasraścaiva hiṃ kīrtitaḥprayoktṛbhiḥ ||
kanīyastu smṛtaṃ tryasraṃ caturasraṃ tu madhyamam |
jyeṣṭhaṃ vikṛṣṭaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāṭyaveśamanāṭyaveśm vibhāgaśaḥnāṭyavedaprayoktṛbhiḥ||)
yacca pramāṇanirdiṣṭaṃpramāṇaṃ yacca nirdiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ viśvakarmaṇā |
prekṣāgṛhāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ taccaiva hi nibodhata || 12 ||
aṇu rajaśca vālaśca likṣā yūkā yavastathā |
aṅgulaṃ caiva hastaścaca tathā hasto daṇḍaśca parikartitaḥtathā daṇḍaka eva cadaṇḍaścaiva prakīrtitaḥ || 13 ||
aṇavo 'ṣṭau rajaḥ proktaṃ tānyaṣṭau vāla ucyace |
vālāstvaṣṭau bhavellikṣā yūkā likṣāṣṭakaṃyūkā tvaṣṭaguṇā bhavet || 14 ||
yūkāstvaṣṭau yavaḥ proktoyavo jñeyo aṅgulantu yavāṣṭakamṣṭāvathāṅgulamyavāstvaṣṭau tathāṅgulam |
aṅgulāni caturviśaddhasta ityabhidhīyateaṅgulāni tathā hastaścaturviṃśatirucyate|| 15 ||
caturhasto bhaveddaṇḍo nirdiṣṭastu pramāṇataḥ |
anenaiva vidhānenapramāṇena vakṣyāmyeṣāṃ vinirṇayam || 16 ||
catuḥṣaṣṭikarānkuryāddīrghatvena tu maṇḍapamcatuḥṣaṣṭirbhaveddhastādīrghaṃ vai nāṭyamaṇḍapam |
dvātriṃśena tudvātriṃśadeva vistāraḥvistārastriṃśadevāsyadvātriṃśataiva vistāramdvātriṃśataṃ ca vistārānmartyānāṃ yo bhavedihatu bhavedihayojayediha || 17 ||
ata ūrdhvaṃ na kartavyaḥ kartṛbhirnāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ |
yasmādavyaktabhāvaṃ hi tasmānnāṭyaṃtasminnāṭyaṃtatra nāṭyaṃ vrajedyataḥbhaveditibhavedyataḥvrajediti || 18 ||
maṇḍape viprakṛṣṭe tu pāṭhyamuccāritasvaram |
anabhivyaktavarṇatvātanissaraṇavarṇatvātavismaraṇaanissaraṇadharmatvādvisvaratvaṃ bhṛśaṃ vrajetduccaratvaṃ bhṛśaṃ vrajet || 19 ||
yaścāpyāsyagato rāgo bhāvasṛṣṭirasāśrayaḥnānābhāvarasāśrayaḥ yaścāpyāsyagato rāso bhāvadṛṣṭirasāśrayaḥyasya lāsyagato bhāvo nānādṛṣṭiyaścāpyasya gataḥ rāgo rucidṛṣṭirasāśrayaḥyaścāpyāsyagato bhāvo nānādṛṣṭisamanvitaḥ |
sa ca veśmaveśmaviprakṛsa veśmanaḥ prakṛṣṭatvādvrajedavyaktatāṃ itiparamparām || 20 ||
prekṣāgṛhāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tasmānmadhyamamiṣyate |
yasmātअयं श्लोको वास्तिvādyaṃ ca geyaṃ ca sukhaśravyataraṃ bhavetyāvatpāṭhyaṃ ca geyaṃ ca tatra śravyataraṃ bhavetomits this || 21 ||
पद्यद्वयं ब पुस्तक एवास्ति(prekṣāgṛhāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ triprakāro vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
vikṛṣṭaścaturasraśca tryasraścaiva prayoktṛbhiḥ ||
kanīyastu smṛtaṃ tryasraṃ caturasraṃ ca madhyamam |
jyeṣṭhaṃ vikṛṣṭaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāṭyaveśma prayoktṛbhiḥ ||)
devānāṃ mānasī sṛṣṭirgṛheṣūpavaneṣu ca |
yatra bhāvādviniṣpannāḥyatnabhāvāyatnabhāvābhiniṣpannāḥ sarve bhāvā histu mānuṣāḥ || 22 ||
N अ इदमर्ध नास्तिtasmāddevakṛtairbhāvairna vispardheta mānuṣaḥ |
idamapi nāstimānuṣasya tu gehasya sampravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam || 23 ||
bhūmibhāgaṃ parīkṣeta prathamaṃ nāṭyaveśmanaḥbhūmervibhāgaṃ prathamampūrvaṃ tu parīkṣeta vicakṣaṇaḥprayojakaḥ |
tato vāstupramāṇaṃ cavāstu pramāṇena prārabheta yadṛcchayāśubhecchayā || 24 ||
samā sthirā prakahyakasukacatu kaṭhinā kṛṣṇā gaurī ca yā bhavet |
bhūmistatraivastatra tu kartavyaḥ kartṛbhirnāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ || 25 ||
prathamaṃ śodhanaṃ kṛtvā lāṅgalena samutkṣipetsamuttuṣetsamutkṛṣet |
asthikīlakapālānikapālādi tṛṇagulmāṃśca śodhayet || 26 ||
śodhayitvā vasumatīṃ pramāṇaṃ nirdiśettataḥ |
इदं पद्यं क्ष म त पुस्तकेष्वेव दृश्यतेN omits d.(trīṇyuttarāṇi saumyaṃ ca viśākhāpi ca revatī ||
hastatiṣyānurādhāśca praśastā nāṭyakarmaṇi |)
puṣyanakṣatrayogenayoge tu śuklaṃ sūtraṃ nidhāpayetprasārayet || 27 ||
kāryāsaṃ bādaraṃ vāpi vālkalaṃ mauñjameva vāvālkalaṃ cāpi bālvajaṃ mauñjameva caśāṇajaṃ vāpi vālkalaṃ mauñjameva cabālbajaṃ vāpi mauñjaṃ vālkalameva ca |
sūtraṃ budhenabudhaistu kartavyaṃ chedo yasyayasya cchedo na vidyate || 28 ||
ardhacchinne bhavetsūtre svāmino maraṇaṃ dhruvam |
tribhāgetribhāgacchinnayā rajjvā rājakopo 'bhidhīyaterāṣṭrakṣobhorāṣṭraṃ kośaśca hīyaterāṣṭrakopo vidhīyate || 29 ||
chinnāyāṃ tu caturbhāge prayokturnāśa ucyate |
hastaprahastaprakṛṣṭayā cāpihastātprabhraṣṭayā vāpi kaccittasmātpāpacayokaścittvapacayo bhavet || 30 ||
hastātasmānnityaṃ prayatnena rajjvā grahaṇarajjugrahaṇamiṣyate |
kāryaṃ caiva viśeṣeṇaprayatnena mānaṃ nāṭyagṛhasya tu || 31 ||
muhūrtenānukūlena tithyātathā sukaraṇena ca |
brāhmaṇāṃstarpayitvā tuca puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥbrāhmaṇāṃstarpayitvā tu tataḥ sūtraṃ prasārayet | इति अर्धमेव पठ्यते || 32 ||
omits this line>śāntitoyaṃ tato dattvā tataḥ sūtraṃ prasārayet |
catuṣṣaṣṭikarānkṛtvā dvidhābhūtān punastataḥbhūtān punaḥpunaḥdvidhā kuryātpunaśca tān || 33 ||
pṛṣṭhato yo bhavedbhāgo dvidhā bhūto bhavecca saḥdvidhābhūtasya tasya tu |
tasyāpyardhārdhabhāgenatasyārdhena vibhāgena tasyāpyardhavibhāge tusamamardhavibhāgena raṅgaśīrṣa prayojayetprakalpayet || 34 ||
paścime tu punarbhāgepaścime ca vibhāge 'tha nepathyagṛhamādiśet |
vikalpyavibhajya bhāgānvidhivadyathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ || 35 ||
śubhe nakṣatrayoge ca maṇḍapasya niveśanam |
sārdha dundubhinirghoṣairmṛdaṅgapaṭahādibhiḥśaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣairmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhiḥ || 36 ||
sarvatūryaninādaiścasarvātodyaninādaiścabherītūryaninādaiśca gāyanīgāyanairbahusarvātodyairninādaistusarvātodyaiḥ praṇuditaiḥ sthāpanaṃ kāryameva tuca |
utsāryāṇi tvaniṣṭāni maṇḍapāśrayiṇastathāpākhaṇḍāśrayaṇāstathāpāṣaṇḍyāśramiṇastathā || 37 ||
kāṣāyavasanāścaiva vikalāścaiva ye narāḥ |
niśāyāṃ ca baliḥ kāryo nānābhojanasaṃyutaḥsaṃśrayaḥsañcayaḥnānāvyañjanasaṃśrayaḥ || 38 ||
gandhapuṣpaphalopeto diśo daśa samāśritaḥ |
pūrveṇa śuklānnayuto nīlaścaiva tu dakṣiṇaḥnidhāno dakṣiṇena canīlo yāmyena caiva hinīlaḥ savyena caiva hinīlānno dakṣiṇena ca || 39 ||
paścimena baliḥ pīto raktaścaivottareṇa tu |
yasyāṃ yaccādhidaivaṃ tu diśi samparikīrtitamyasyā yathādhidevastu digīśaḥ parikīrtitaḥyādṛśaṃ diśi yasyāṃ tu daivataṃ parikalpitam || 40 ||
tādṛśastatra dātavyo balirmantrapuraskṛtaḥ |
sthāpane brāhmaṇebhyaśca dātavyaṃ ghṛtapāyasam || 41 ||
madhuparkastathā rājñe kartṛbhyaśca guḍaudanam |
nakṣatreṇa tu kartavyaṃ mūlena sthāpanaṃ budhaiḥ || 42 ||
muhurtenānukūlena tithyānukaraṇena catiṣyānukaraṇena catithyā sukaraṇena ca |
evaṃ tu sthāpanaṃ kṛtvā bhittikarma prayojayet || 43 ||
bhittikarmaṇi nirvṛtte stambhānāṃ sthāpanaṃ tataḥ |
tithinakṣatrayogena śubhena karaṇena ca || 44 ||
एतत्पद्यस्थाने ‘आचार्येण सुयुक्तेन कार्य सूर्योदये शुभे ।’ इति पठ्यतेstambhānāṃ sthāpanaṃ kārya rohiṇyā śravaṇena vā |
ācāryeṇa suyuktena trirātropoṣitena ca || 45 ||
stambhānāṃ sthāpanaṃ caiva kārya sūryodaye budhaiḥcaiva kārya sūryodaye śubhe | candanaṃ ca bhavedbrāhmaṃ kṣātraṃ khādirameva ca | dhāvākhyaṃ veśyavarṇa syācchatraṃ sarvadrumaiḥ smṛtamkārya prāpte sūryodaye śubhe |
prathame brāhmaṇastambhe sarpissarṣapasaṃskṛtaḥsaṃskṛte || 46 ||
sarvaśuklo vidhiḥ kāryo dadyātpāyasameva ca |
tataśca kṣatriyastambhe vastramālyānulepanam || 47 ||
sarva raktaṃ pradātavyaṃ dvijebhyaśca guḍaudanam |
vaiśyastambhe vidhiḥ kāryo digbhāge paścimottare || 48 ||
pītaṃ sarvamsarva pītaṃ pradātavyaṃ dvijebhyaśca ghṛtāśanamghṛtaudanam |
śūdrastambhe vidhiḥ kāryaḥ samyakpūrvottarāśraye || 49 ||
nīlaprāyaṃ pradātavyamprayatnena kṛsarā cakṛśarākṛsaraṃ ca dvijāśanam |
pūrve tupūrvoktabrāhmaṇastambhe śuklamālyānulepanelepitelepanam || 50 ||
omits thisnikṣipetkanakaṃ mūle kaṇṭhābharakarṇābharaṇasaṃśrayam |
tāmraṃ vāpicāpicaiva cādhaḥ pradātavyaṃ stambhe kṣatriyasaṃjñake || 51 ||
vaiśyasya stambhamūlevaiśyastambhasya mūle tu rajataṃ sampradāphyet |
śūdrasya stambhamūleśūdrastambhasya mūle tu dadyādāyasameva catu || 52 ||
śeṣeṣveva tu nikṣepyamśeṣeṣvapi tuśeṣeṣveva tu dātavyaṃsarveṣveva tu nikṣepyaṃ stambhamūle tustambhamūleṣu kāñcanam |
svastipuṇyāhaghoṣeṇa jayaśabdena caiva hi || 53 ||
stambhānāṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryātsthāpanaṃ kārya vargaparṇavarṇavanamālāsamanvitam puṣpamālāpuraskṛtam |
ratnapradānairgodānaiḥratnadānaiḥ sagodānairvastradānairanalpakaiḥstathaiva ca || 54 ||
brāhmaṇāṃstarpayitvāsthāpayitvā tu stambhānutthāpayettataḥ |
acalaṃ cāpyakampyañcacāpyakampañca tathaivāvalitaṃtathā calitameva tutathaivācalitaṃ punaḥtathaivāskhalitam punaḥ || 55 ||
stambhānutthāpayetstambhamutthāpayetstambhasyotthāpane samyagdoṣā hyete prakīrtitāḥ |
adṛṣṭiavṛṣṭiruktā calane valane mṛtitomṛtyuto bhayam || 56 ||
kampane paracakrāttuparacakrebhyaḥna kampite pararāṣṭrebhyaḥ bhayaṃ vadatibhavati dāruṇam |
doṣairetairvihīnaṃ tu stambhamutthāpayecchivamcchubham || 57 ||
pavitrampavitre brāhmaṇastambhe dātavyā dakṣiṇā ca gauḥ |
śeṣāṇāṃ sthāpanebhojanaṃ kārya sthāpanebhojanam kartṛsaṃśrayam || 58 ||
mantrapūrva camantrapūtaṃ ca taddeyaṃ nāṭyācāryeṇa dhīmatā |
purohitaṃ nṛpaṃ caiva bhojayenmadhupāyasaiḥpāyasamdatha pāyasam || 59 ||
kartṝnapi tathā sarvānkṛsarāṃ lavaṇottarāmttaramkṛsarān lavaṇottarān |
sarvamevaṃ vidhiṃ kṛtvā sarvātodyaiḥ pravāditaiḥ || 60 ||
abhimantrya yathānyāyaṃ stambhamutthāpayetstambhānutthāpayecchuciḥ |
'yathā 'calo girirmerurhimavāṃśca yathācalaḥmahābalaḥ || 61 ||
jayāvaho narendrasya yathā tvamacalo vahayathātathā tvamacalo bhava |'
stambhadvāraṃ ca bhittiṃ ca nepathyagṛhameva ca || 62 ||
evamutthāpayettajjñotprājño vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā |
raṅgapīṭhasya paścāttupārśve tu kartavyā mattavāraṇī || 63 ||
catuḥstambhasamāyuktā raṅgapīṭhapramāṇataḥ |
adhyardhahastotsedhenahastā cotsedhā kartavyā mattavāraṇī || 64 ||
ūtsedhena tayā tulyamtayostulyaṃ kartavyaṃ raṅgamaṇḍapam |
tasyāṃ mālyaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca gandhaṃ vastraṃ tathaiva ca || 65 ||
nānāvarṇaṃ pradhātavyaṃnānāvarṇāni deyāni tathā bhūtapriyo baliḥ |
āsanaṃ cātrapāyasaṃ cātraāyasaṃ tatra dātavyaṃ stambhānāṃ kuśalairadhaḥ || 66 ||
bhojanaṃ kṛśarābhojane kṛsarāśvaiva dātavyādātavyaṃ brāhmaṇāśanambrāhmaṇāya ca |
evaṃ vidhaiḥvidhipuraskāraiḥ kartavyā mattavāraṇī || 67 ||
raṅgapīṭhaṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā |
raṅgaśīrṣantu kartavyaṃ ṣaḍdārukasamanvitammasaṃvṛtam || 68 ||
kāryaṃ dvāradvayaṃ cātra nepathyagṛhakasya nepathyasya gṛhasya catu |
pūraṇe mṛttikā cātra kṛṣṇā deyā prayatnataḥ || 69 ||
lāṅgale calāṅgalena samutkṛṣya nirloṣṭatṛṇaśarkaramśarkarāmśarkarā |
lāṅgale śuddhavarṇovarṇe tu dhuryau yojyau prayatnataḥ || 70 ||
kartāraḥ puruṣāścātrapuruṣāścaivapuruṣāstastra ryeśabda 'ṅgadoṣavivarjitāḥ |
ahīnāścaivaahīnāṅgaiśca voḍhavyā mṛttikā piṭakairnaveḥpīvarairnaraiḥ | piṭakairnaraiḥ || 71 ||
evaṃvidhaiśca kartavyamevaṃvidhaiḥ prakartavyaṃ raṅgaśīrṣaṃ prayatnataḥ |
kūrmapṛṣṭhaṃ na kartavyaṃ matsyapṛṣṭhaṃ tathaiva ca || 72 ||
śuddhādarśatalākāraṃtalaprakhyam raṅgaśīrṣaraṅgapīṭham praśasyate |
ratnāni cātra deyāni pūrve vajraṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ || 73 ||
vaiḍūryaṃ dakṣiṇe caivapārśve sphaṭikaṃ paścime tathā |
pravālamuttare caiva pārśvemadhye tu kanakaṃ bhavettathā || 74 ||
evaṃ raṅgaśiraḥ kṛtvā dārukarma prayojayetpravartayet |
ūhapratyūhasaṃyuktaṃ nānāśilpaprayojitamsamanvitam || 75 ||
nānāsañjavanopetaṃ bahuvyālopaśobhitam |
‘भवेयुश्चात्र विन्यस्ता विविधाः सालभञ्जिकाः ।’ इत्यधिकं दृश्यतेaṭṭālabhañjiitaḥ pañca paṅktayo na santi | tatsālamañjikāḥ strībhiḥsasālabhañjikābhiśca samantātsamalaṅgakṛtam || 76 ||
nirvyūhakuharopetaṃ nānāgrathitavedikam |
nānāracitavinyāsaṃnānāvinyāsasaṃyuktaṃ yantrajālacitrajālagavākṣakam || 77 ||
supīṭhadhāriṇīyuktaṃ kapotālīsamākulam |
nānākuṭṭimavinyastaiḥ stambhaiścāpyupaśobhitam || 78 ||
evaṃ kāṣṭhavidhiṃ kṛtvā bhittikarma prayojayet |
stambhaṃ vā nāgadantaṃ vā vātāyanamathāpi vā || 79 ||
kārṣṇāyasaṃ pratikoṇaṃ vā sapratidvāraṃ dāruviddhamdvāraviddhaṃ na dāpayet kārayet |
dvibhūmirmaṇḍapaḥ kāryo guhākāraḥ sthirākṛtiḥkāryaṃ śailaguhākāro dvibhūmirnāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ || 80 ||
mandavātāyanāpeto nivātonirvāto dhīraśabdavānśabdabhāk |
tasmānnivātaḥ kartavyaḥ kartṛbhirnāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ || 81 ||
gambhīratvādvai— (svaryam) | gambhīrasvaratā yenagāmbhīryaṃ susvaratvaṃ casagāmbhīryādavaisvaryam yena syātkutapasya tukutapasya bhavedihabhaviṣyati |
bhittikarmavidhiṃ kṛtvā bhittilepaṃ pradāpayet || 82 ||
sudhākarma vidhistasyatathaivāsya kuryādvāhyambahistasya vidhātanyaṃ prayatnataḥ |
bhittiṣvatha viliptāsubhittiṣvapi ca liptāsumittikamasu liptāsu nirmṛṣṭāsu punaḥpunaḥparimṛṣṭāsu sarvataḥparivṛttāsu sarvaśaḥ || 83 ||
samāsu jātaśobhāsu citrakarma pravartayetprayojayet |
citrakarmaṇicitrakarmāṇī cālekhyāḥ puruṣāḥ strījanāstathā || 84 ||
latābandhāścabaddhāśca kartavyāścaritaṃ cātmabhogajam |
evaṃ vikṛṣṭaṃ kartavyaṃ nāṭyaveśma prayoktṛbhiḥ || 85 ||
punarevaataḥ param hi vakṣyāmi caturaśrasya lakṣaṇam |
samantatastu kartavyo hastosamantataśca kartavyā hastā dvātriṃśadeva tu || 86 ||
śubhabhūmivibhāgastho nāṭyajñairnāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ |
yo vidhiḥ pūrvamuktastu lakṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalāni camaṇṭapāni camaṅgalāni ca || 87 ||
caturaśrasya tānyeva kārayennāṭyaveśmanaḥvikṛṣṭe tānyaśeṣāṇi caturaśre 'pi kārayet |
caturaśraṃ samaṃ kṛtvā sūtreṇa pravibhajya ca || 88 ||
bāhyataḥ sarvataḥ kāryā bhittiḥ śilaṣṭeṣṭakādayaḥśliṣṭeṣṭakā dṛ̣dhā |
kṛtābhyantarataḥ kāryaṃ raṅgapīṭhaṃ yathāvidhiraṅgapīṭhe yathādiśamyathā dṛḍhamtatrābhyantarataḥ kāryā raṅgapīṭhopari sthitāḥ || 89 ||
daśa prayoktṛbhiḥ stambhāḥśastā śastā maṇḍapalakṣaṇeśubhā maṇḍapadhāriṇaḥśakyā maṇḍaparakṣaṇeśaktā maṇḍapadhāraṇe |
stambhānāṃ bāhyataścāpisthāpyam sopānākṛtisopānakṛtasopānakṛti pīṭhakam || 90 ||
dīrghadārviṣṭakābhiścaiṣṭakādārubhiḥ kāryaṃ prekṣakāṇāṃ niveśanam |
hastapramāṇairutsedhairbhūmibhāgasamutthitaiḥ || 91 ||
raṅgapīṭhavilokyaṃraṅgapīṭhāvalokyaṃālokya raṅgapīṭhasya tu kuryādāsanikamkuryādāsanajaṃ vidhim |
ṣaḍanyānsundarāndadyātṣaḍanyānsāntarāndadyātṣaḍnyāsān sāntarānṣaḍanyānantare caiva punaḥ stambhānyathādiśamyathādaram || 92 ||
vidhinā dhārayettajjñosthāpayetprājñosthāpayetprājño gụ̄dhā maṇṭapasthāpayettajjño dṛ̣dhānmaṇḍapadhāraṇe |
aṣṭau stambhānpunaścaiva teṣāmupari kārayetkalpayet || 93 ||
saṃsthāpya ca punaḥ pīṭhamaṣṭhahastapramāṇataḥviddhāsyaṃ ca punaḥ pīṭhamaṣṭau hastapramāṇataḥviddhāsyamaṣṭahastaṃ ca pīṭhaṃ teṣu tato nyasetsthāpyaṃ caiva tataḥ pīṭhamaṣṭahastapramāṇataḥ |
viddhāsyamaṣṭahastaṃ ca pīṭhaṃ teṣu tato nyasetइतः परं ‘संस्थाप्यं च ततः पीठमष्टहस्तप्रमाणतः ।’ इति पठ्यतेइदमर्धं नास्ति || 94 ||
tatra stambhāḥ pradātavyāstajjñairmaṇḍapadhāraṇe |
dharaṇīdhāritāstedhāraṇīdhāratāste cadhāraṇīdhāraṇāste ca śālāstrībhiralaṅkṛtāḥsālastrīśālastrībhiralaṅkṛtāḥ || 95 ||
nepathyagṛhakaṃ caiva tataḥ kāryaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥprayatnataḥ |
dvāraṃ caikaṃ bhavettatra raṅgapīṭhapraveśanampraveśane || 96 ||
janapraveśanaṃcaikamāpraveśane caivamādimukhyena cānyadābhimukhyena kārayet |
raṅgasyābhimukhaṃ kāryaṃ dvitīyaṃ dvārameva tu || 97 ||
aṣṭahastaṃ tu kartavyaṃ raṅgapīṭhaṃ pramāṇataḥ |
caturaśraṃcaturaśre samatalaṃ vedikāsamalaṅkṛtam || 98 ||
pūrvapramāṇanirdiṣṭā kartavyā mattavāraṇī |
catuḥstambhasamāyuktā vedikāyāstu pārśvataḥ || 99 ||
samunnataṃ samaṃ caiva raṅgapīṭhamraṅgaśīrṣaṃ tuprakārayet kārayet |
vikṛṣṭe pyunnatamhyannatamtūnnataṃ kāryaṃ caturaśre samaṃ tathā || 100 ||
evametena vidhinā caturaśraṃ gṛhaṃ bhavet |
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tryaśragehasyatryaśrasya maṇḍapasyāmi saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam || 101 ||
tryaśraṃ trikoṇaṃ kartavyaṃ nāṭyaveśma prayoktṛbhiḥ |
madhye trikoṇamekartavyamvāsya raṅgapīṭhaṃ tu kārayet || 102 ||
dvāraṃ dvāramekenatenaiva koṇena kartavyaṃ tu prakāśane tanniveśanamtu praveśanetasya niveśanātveśmanaḥ |
dvitīyaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ raṅgapīṭhasya pṛṣṭhataḥ || 103 ||
dvitīya caturaśrasyavidheyaśca purastasyavidhiryaścaturaśrasya bhittistambhasamāśrayaḥsamanvitaḥ |
sa tu sarvaḥ prayoktavyastryaśrasyāpi prayoktṛbhiḥ || 104 ||
evametena vidhinā kāryā nāṭyagṛhākāryaṃ nāṭyagṛhaṃ budhaiḥ budhaiḥ |
ata ūrdhvamtata ūrdhvampunareṣāṃ pravakṣyāmi pūjāmevaṃmeṣām yathāvidhi || 105 ||
iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre maṇḍapavidhānoprekṣāgṛhalakṣaṇamnāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
